definition[1]: if your skin feels prickly, it stings slightly
example[1]: His skin felt painful and prickly.
example[2]: The base of my neck was prickly with sweat.
definition[2]: something that is prickly makes your skin sting slightly
definition[3]: someone who is prickly gets annoyed or offended easily
example[4]: She was prickly and sharp with me.
example[5]: As she got older, she became more prickly and forgetful.
definition[4]: a prickly subject causes a lot of disagreements and difficulties
example[6]: We finally turned to the prickly question of who was going to pay.
